text: is a Japanese politician of the Democratic Party. He was a member of the House of Councillors in the Diet, and general secretary of the ruling Democratic Party. He was elected to the House of Representatives of Japan in 1990, where he served for two terms until 1996 when he failed to be re-elected. He was elected to the House of Councillors for the first time in 1998.The Japan Times Koshiishi still siding with Ozawa September 17 2011 Retrieved on August 12, 2012 ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Yamanashi Prefecture
title: Azuma Koshiishi
